name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForInvasiveMechanicalVentilation
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Invasive Mechanical Ventilation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to invasive mechanical ventilation.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes volume and pressure controlled ventilation.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
